attributes.action: Provide more residential schools for children and young people with Aspergers Syndrome
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many children with Aspergers Syndrome do not get diagnosed until they are in their teens. Many children with Aspergers Syndrome do not get effective nor joined-up   support  from Health, Education, and most of them are never referred to social services for any extra help which they could deliver. Some Local Authorities in Wales are closing Brand New State of the Art Residential Homes Pre-maturely.
